imos
Interface IImos

All Known Implementing Classes:
Imos
public interface IImos

The Intrinsically Motivated Schema mechanism (Ernest's sequential system).

Author:
ogeorgeon

addInteraction

IAct addInteraction(java.lang.String moveLabel,
                    java.lang.String effectLabel,
                    int satisfaction)
Constructs a new interaction in episodic memory. or retrieve the the interaction if it already exists. The interaction's action is recorded as a primitive schema. If there is no stimuli, the interaction is marked as the schema's succeeding or failing interaction.

Parameters:
moveLabel - The move label
effectLabel - The effect label
satisfaction - The interaction's satisfaction.
Returns:
The act that was created or that already existed.

setTracer

void setTracer(ITracer<java.lang.Object> tracer)
Parameters:
tracer - The tracer used to generate the activity traces

getInternalState

java.lang.String getInternalState()
Get a description of the agent's internal state. (for visualization in the environment).

Returns:
A representation of Ernest's internal state

getCounter

int getCounter()
The counter of interaction cycles.

Returns:
The current interaction cycle number.

addCompositeInteraction

IAct addCompositeInteraction(IAct contextAct,
                             IAct intentionAct)
Can be used to initialize Ernest with inborn composite schemes

Parameters:
contextAct - The context act
intentionAct - The intention act
Returns:
The created composite interaction
